table.title: Quota Usage
table.searchTemplate: sourcetype="SharepointAuditLogger" | eval Quota_Usage_Percentage=round( (StorageMB/StorageMaximumLevelMB)*100)|rename StorageMB as Used_Space,StorageMaximumLevelMB as Allocated_Space | stats dc(SiteName) as count by SiteName,Used_Space,Allocated_Space,Quota_Usage_Percentage|fields - count
